testCaseName: Revenue Calculation with Multiple Currencies Positive Test
description: Verify revenue calculation functionality with multiple currency support
preconditions: User is logged into the system
Multi-currency revenue calculation module is accessible

testSteps.action: Navigate to multi-currency revenue calculation page
testSteps.expectedResult: Multi-currency revenue calculation form is displayed
EUR currency is selected and exchange rate is displayed
Base amount in EUR is accepted and displayed
Tax calculation is performed in EUR
Discount is calculated and applied in EUR
Revenue calculation with currency conversion is completed

testSteps.action: Verify calculated amounts in both EUR and USD
testSteps.expectedResult: All calculated amounts match expected values in both currencies

testResults.notes: Multi-currency revenue calculations work correctly. Exchange rate conversion is accurate.
